|brand = Iomega |model = StorCenter |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = ix2-dl |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = NAS |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6282;Armada 300, (Feroceon core); |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = v5<!-- TE --> |cpu1spd = 1.6 GHz <!-- 1.2 / 1.6 / 2.0 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;K9K8G08U0D-SCB0; |flash1size = 1 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CB128M16BP-CG; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1318; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:D0:B8
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell 3.6.1 - EMC; |stockos = Linux;2.6.31.8;KW LSP release 5.1.3 patch 25;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, SATA 2 |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_sata_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery backup |addchip = 2A Ultra Low Dropout LDO Regulator;Richtek;RT9025;;1; ,,, 3A Ultra Low Dropout Linear Regulator;ANPEC;APL5930;;2; ,,, Low Drop Adjustable Voltage Regulator;Unisonic;LD1117AG;;1; ,,, 30V P-Channel MOSFET;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4407A;;1; ,,, 30V N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4468;;2; ,,, 30V N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4712;;2; ,,, 30V Dual N & P-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDS8958A;;2; ,,, Remote Thermal Monitor and Fan Control;ON Semiconductor;ADT7473;;1; ,,, Dual PWM Step Down Controller w/ Low Power LDO, RTC Regulator;Maxim;MAX17020;;1; ,,, Dual D-type positive-edge-triggered flip-flop;Texas Instruments;SN74AHC74;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Debian

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "11014-1M", "48.63Y01.10M" and "HOMEMEDIA MB" :are silkscreened on the board.
